attributes.action: implement a mandatory custodial sentence for all individuals caught carrying an offensive weapon in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the recent and continued knife crimes across the country the government needs to take a strong and unequivical stance on this matter by introducing a repercussion for people caught carrying offensive weapons that will actually make them stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
